description:
reverted but kept the new drums
The tab is as accurate as it can be harmony wise. Doesn't matter if it's a recorded song, the song was written with all those parts. The Master of Puppets tab also contains all the harmonies and quirks from how it was recorded. But there is always the option of uploading a separate "simple" tab version
title: The Memory Remains

description: I removed a few parts of the song as it is already a recorded song, without any studio parts that can be done in a separate song (studio version). I also fixed the PORRIDGE from the drums, now they are even and correct.
title: The Memory Remains

reports.summary: I understand that it is a "recorded song", but we really shouldn't remove this detailed tab and replace it with a barebones one. In any case, it should be the other way around. All tabs with the title track should be as accurate as possible to how they were recorded. If you prefer one where instruments are kept at a minimum (guitars, bass, drums) then uploading another tab with the "Band Only" added to the name. It's the same as uploading the songs covered in S&M without the orchestra. It just wouldn't make much sense.

description: some guy put his email all over the tab
title: The Memory Remains

- Removed some repeated parts
- Also moved the middle part

description:
Revision 3.3

- Fixed the Chorus riff
- Lowered BPM to 145
- Added more accurate outro

description:
Revision "3.2"
- Removed One additional Kirk track since I found no more use for it (-1 octave solo)
- Added Missing Kirk Harmony
- Added Additional Kirk Harmony
- Added Palm Mutes to James part during the Harmony like the song
- Fixed James' part so instead of a 3 to 12 slide its a 3 to 7 string skip (should be possible to play now)
This tab should be pretty accurate, any feedback let me know on the Bar's comments
title: The Memory Remains

description:
I would like to call this Tab revision "3"
- Added Solos to Kirk's track
- Tidied up all the tracks and better naming
- Added Studio tracks (Guitar tracks not hearable in the Mix)
- Added dead notes on the main riff
- Changed Solo fingerings to correct fingerings and how kirk plays the solos (Took me like an hour)

Any feed back leave it on the bars below or Bar 1, since I usually look through tabs after uploading them to make sure I did not forget anything. Hope y'all enjoy this revision.
title: The Memory Remains
